name: swag
description: SWAG (Secure Web Application Gateway) is a Docker image that bundles Nginx, Letâ€™s Encrypt, and security defaults to provide a secure reverse proxy and SSL gateway for self-hosted services.
features: Reverse proxy: Routes traffic to multiple backend services from single entry point.
Let's Encrypt: Automatically obtains and renews SSL certificates.
Nginx-based: Built on proven Nginx web server for reliability and performance.
Pre-configured security: Includes security headers, rate limiting, and fail2ban integration.
Subdomain routing: Routes requests to different services based on subdomains.
Authentication: Adds authentication layer to services with Authelia or basic auth.
DuckDNS support: Integrates with DuckDNS for dynamic DNS updates.
Config templates: Provides pre-made configs for popular self-hosted applications.
Wildcard certificates: Supports wildcard SSL certificates for multiple subdomains.
GeoIP blocking: Blocks traffic from specific countries or regions.
ModSecurity: Includes web application firewall for additional protection.
Docker integration: Designed specifically for Docker-based service deployments.
